name: Room Cleaning - House Work Girl
description:
Girls, can you clean out your bedroom by yourself? It is not complicated. Let's begin. First, pick up the trash and throw them in the garbage bin. Then, pick up the dirty clothes for washing. Third, put things to their right place. See, the messy room was cleaned. Let's continue to clean a another room. Come on, Have fun with this game!

Feature:
There are hints which make it easy for kids.
Improve memory
Improve logic capability
Totally free to play.
